Head: Hemicrania; sudden glimmering before eyes; feels confused and empty
Pain over eyebrows
Respiratory: ASTHMA, without anxiety, WORSE toward morning
Scratching sensation in throat; stitches in chest
Cough dry, hacking; copious morning sputa
Stomach: Taste of food remains long, especially of bread and toast
Feels heavy, like from a stone
COMPLAINTS FROM EATING MELONS AND DRINKING IMPURE WATER
Heaviness in stomach on awakening with wind and rumbling, great thirst and emptiness
Pain from pit to under sternum, worse eating
Abdomen: Diarrhoea from drinking bad water, with much flatulence, cutting pain, relaxation of sphincter
Hot, sore, painful anus during pregnancy
Urine thick, turbid, of strong odor, suppressed
After urinating, continues to ooze in drops

name: Zingiber
details: States of debility in the digestive tract, and sexual system and respiratory troubles, call for this remedy. Complete cessation of function of kidneys.
